title: Low Elo is such a joke
body: There's absolutely no way out of low elo this season because every match I've had is either filled with whiny mid laners, really bad and lazy junglers, or feeding duo bots...Not to mention they never want to surrender after the score is already 0-12. There's no point in playing this game anymore when you can't even enjoy it with half of the terrible players and the toxicity from those players. I've officially given up on league.
